name: LODV
description:
tirain studio 天雨工作室

Games We Made 我们做的游戏

说明instructions:

Chinese

下载exe安装档案然后打开，进行安装。安装完成之后会在"开始"菜单显示(LODV)点击打开，系统会自动判断您的设备是否可以进行游戏，如果可以，系统就会让您进入游戏。如果您的设备性能强大，系统也会通知你会以什么FPS(详情)进行游戏，如果您的电脑性能不足它就会通知您。但如果您想进入游戏查看，请联系客服(tiraintianyu@gmail.com)

English

Download the exe installation file and open it to install it. After the installation is complete, it will display (LODV) in the "Start menu", click to open, and the system will automatically determine whether your device can play the game and if so, the system will let you enter the game. If your device is powerful, the system will also notify you what FPS (details) you will play at, and it will notify you if your computer's performance is insufficient. But if you want to enter the game to view it, please contact customer service (tiraintianyu@gmail.com)
